unnormalised: Tiatrachi yojna kortana ani patteamvishi chint'ta kortana tanni ghoddlear? Chintna kor naka, *yaar*, mhaka tumchi zobabdari aasa! Online hotel book kortana, Gooogle Maps-ache pat'te sadanuch check kortaa. Paskalya pavtti mi "Hotel Paradise, Railway Stationache lagim, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006" book kelem, "lagim" mhuntlear khoim 3 km dur aasa! Major *lolfail*.
normalised: Thoddi yaatra aayojit kortaa ani pate visheen chinta kortaa? Chinta korunk naka, yaar, hanv tumkam paavtay! Online hotelaa buuk kortana, hanv sadach Google Mapsacher patto don pautti check kortam. Aachelea vellar "Hotel Paradise, Railway Stationacher laggi, Jaipur, Rajasthan teen she ani don hazaar ani so", hanv buuk kelea, "Laggi" faktan teen kilometer dur aslem! Major lolfail.
text: Tiatrachi yojna kortana ani patteamvishi chint'ta kortana tanni ghoddlear? Chintna kor naka, *yaar*, mhaka tumchi zobabdari aasa! Online hotel book kortana, Gooogle Maps-ache pat'te sadanuch check kortaa. Paskalya pavtti mi "Hotel Paradise, Railway Stationache lagim, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006" book kelem, "lagim" mhuntlear khoim 3 km dur aasa! Major *lolfail*.

unnormalised: Ani ti trasdaik booking confirmation-a? Te address-an bhorlele astat! Hotel-cho address, kednaim travel agency-cho address zoso "MakeMyTrip, DLF Building 8, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002", ani billing address-ui. Te lagim samball, khas korun tumchea *auto-walla* kodden disha vichartana! Tankam exact "Landmark" zai asta!
normalised: Ani ti booking confirmation yaad asa? Tan̄cheant address-anchi bharmaar asta! Hotel-cho address, kednam kednam travel agency-cho address tor "MakeMyTrip, D-L-F Building eight, Gurgaon, Haryana one hundred and twenty two thousand and two" bhaxen, ani billing address-ui asta. Te sambhallun dovrat, khas korun tum auto-wallak disha vichartana! Tankam ekdom "Landmark" zai.
text: Ani ti trasdaik booking confirmation-a? Te address-an bhorlele astat! Hotel-cho address, kednaim travel agency-cho address zoso "MakeMyTrip, DLF Building 8, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002", ani billing address-ui. Te lagim samball, khas korun tumchea *auto-walla* kodden disha vichartana! Tankam exact "Landmark" zai asta!

unnormalised: khareech sangche zalear, mhaje pro tip: Hamesha address copy-paste kar! Type chukiche zata. Ekdaan mhaka "22 B Baker Street, Kolkata, West Bengal 700001" hankaan "22/B…." hanchi bhett daddleli. Sodhun ailem, ti lahan slash ek mothe antar korta, lol. To bicharo delivery gao!
normalised: Kharchik bollear, mhaji pro tip: Address hamesha copy-paste kara! Chukar zatat. Mhaka ekda "twenty two B Baker Street, Kolkata, West Bengal seven hundred thousand and one" hya addressacher gift pathovpachem aslem, punn "twenty two slash B…" hacher pathovlem. Dislem ki, tyo lhan so slash khupuch forok korta, lol. To bechara delivery gayanv!
text: khareech sangche zalear, mhaje pro tip: Hamesha address copy-paste kar! Type chukiche zata. Ekdaan mhaka "22 B Baker Street, Kolkata, West Bengal 700001" hankaan "22/B…." hanchi bhett daddleli. Sodhun ailem, ti lahan slash ek mothe antar korta, lol. To bicharo delivery gao!

unnormalised: Tumchea hotelak pavlea uprant ek pro-tip, hotelachea karmacharink hotelacho patto ani lagichem chinnh sthanik bhaxent boroilek sanga. Magir tumkam tumchea *rickshaw-walla* k tumkam tumchea hotelak vhorpak sangpak poddlear, tumi tankam fokot te dakhoieet! Punjabi bhaxent "Shanti Niketan Guest House, Sector 17, Chandigarh, 160017" uchchar korpak prayatn korta mhunn kalpana kara!
normalised: तुम रिगळ्ळ्यानंतर, हॉटेल कर्मचाऱ्यांकडेन हॉटेलचो पत्तो आनी लँडमार्क थळाव्या भाशेंत बरवन घेवपाक सांगात. देखून तुमकां तुमच्या रिक्षा वाल्याक तुमकां तुमच्या हॉटेलांत व्हरपाक सांगावपाची गरज पडल्यार, तुमकां फक्त तांकां दाखोवंक शकता! "शांती निकेतन गेस्ट हाऊस, सेक्टर सतरा, चंडीगड, एक लाख साठ हजार आनी सतरा" पंजाबींत उच्चार करपाक प्रयत्न करता कल्पना करात!
text: Tumchea hotelak pavlea uprant ek pro-tip, hotelachea karmacharink hotelacho patto ani lagichem chinnh sthanik bhaxent boroilek sanga. Magir tumkam tumchea *rickshaw-walla* k tumkam tumchea hotelak vhorpak sangpak poddlear, tumi tankam fokot te dakhoieet! Punjabi bhaxent "Shanti Niketan Guest House, Sector 17, Chandigarh, 160017" uchchar korpak prayatn korta mhunn kalpana kara!

unnormalised: अखेरीक, भोंवडेची नोंदणी शांत जावंक जाय, तणावाची न्हय. थोडें तयारीचें काम पत्त्यां सयत आनी थोडें विनोदीपण तुमचो खूब वेळ वाचयत! खुशाल भोंवडी, इश्टांनो! तुमचो *चाय* विसरचो नाका!
normalised: अखेरीक, भोंवडेची नोंदणी शांत जावंक जाय, तणावाची न्हय. थोंडी तयारी पत्त्यां सयत आनी हास्याचो एक स्पर्श तुमचो खूब वेळ वाचयतलो! खुशाल भोंवडी, इश्टांनो! तुमचो चाय विसरू नाकात!
text: अखेरीक, भोंवडेची नोंदणी शांत जावंक जाय, तणावाची न्हय. थोडें तयारीचें काम पत्त्यां सयत आनी थोडें विनोदीपण तुमचो खूब वेळ वाचयत! खुशाल भोंवडी, इश्टांनो! तुमचो *चाय* विसरचो नाका!
